text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GE63 Raider RGB-052 Premium Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7-8750H, 16GB RAM, 1TB HDD + 512GB Sata SSD, 15.6" FHD 1920x1080 IPS Display, NVIDIA RTX 2070, RGB Front Cover Keyboard, Win 10 Home)!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Apex Legends. The build quality of the MSI GE63 Raider RGB-052 Premium Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7-8750H, 16GB RAM, 1TB HDD + 512GB Sata SSD, 15.6" FHD 1920x1080 IPS Display, NVIDIA RTX 2070, RGB Front Cover Keyboard, Win 10 Home) is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
